ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.1_0: and how many things that are a condition for the six fields of contact?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.2_0: he frequents two offenses with sex.

ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.1_0: Or out of disrespect, defecate, urinate, or spit in water?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, thinking:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:3.1_0: The third section for recitation on the almsbowls is finished.
